system.effect: The impact fills the target's head with a terrible ringing noise. The target must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer 1 level of Fatigue.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Head (Severity 1)

The impact fills the target's head with a terrible ringing noise. The target must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer 1 level of Fatigue.
